blocks.name: cdrng
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all division rings.

blocks.name: df-drngo
blocks.content: Define the class of all division rings (sometimes called skew fields). A division ring is a unital ring where every element except the additive identity has a multiplicative inverse. (Contributed by NM, 4-Apr-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: isdivrngo
blocks.content: The predicate "is a division ring". (Contributed by FL, 6-Sep-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cgi, c4))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cdrng), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(cres(c1, cxp(cdif(c2, csn(c3)), cdif(c2, csn(c3)))), cgr)), wa(wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), crngo), wcel(cres(c1, cxp(cdif(c2, csn(c3)), cdif(c2, csn(c3)))), cgr)))

  elopabi(hs0, hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crngo), wcel(cres(cv(hs1), cxp(cdif(crn(cv(hs0)), csn(cfv(cgi, cv(hs0)))), cdif(crn(cv(hs0)), csn(cfv(cgi, cv(hs0)))))), cgr)), wa(wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), crngo), wcel(cres(c1, cxp(cdif(c2, csn(c3)), cdif(c2, csn(c3)))), cgr)), wa(wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cv(hs1)), crngo), wcel(cres(cv(hs1), cxp(cdif(c2, csn(c3)), cdif(c2, csn(c3)))), cgr)))

  opeq1(cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, c0), cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(cres(cv(hs1), cxp(cdif(crn(cv(hs0)), csn(cfv(cgi, cv(hs0)))), cdif(crn(cv(hs0)), csn(cfv(cgi, cv(hs0)))))), cgr, cres(cv(hs1), cxp(cdif(c2, csn(c3)), cdif(c2, csn(c3)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, c0)))

  sqxpeqd(cdif(crn(cv(hs0)), csn(cfv(cgi, cv(hs0)))), cdif(c2, csn(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, c0)))
  difeq12d(crn(cv(hs0)), csn(cfv(cgi, cv(hs0))), c2, csn(c3), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, c0)))
  syl6eqr(crn(cv(hs0)), c2, crn(c4), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, c0)))
  rneqd(cv(hs0), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, c0)))
  sneqd(cfv(cgi, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, c0)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cgi, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cgi, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, c0)))

blocks.name: zrdivrng

blocks.content: In a division ring the unit is different from the zero. (Contributed by FL, 14-Feb-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

} = {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c1))

} = {

  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wf(c0, cxp(crn(c0), crn(c0)), crn(c0)), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wrex(hs0, crn(c0), wral(s0, crn(c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))))))
